column3: A central spot among the different attractions, restaurants, and shops. Various actors in costumes come through highlighting different iconic Universal movies over the years.
The open area is near the Universal Studios entrance. It is a popular entertainment area. Concerts are held here and there are shops in the plaza.

column3: Lots of choices for places to eat, high end fashion stores and specialty shops. The comic book store is worth a visit just to look at the nic naks. There is a colourful, in-sidewalk fountain. which is clearly programmed to different colours and patterns.
